text: Michael Rye (John Michael "Mike" Riorden Billsbury March 2, 1918 â€“ September 21, 2012)Michael Rye dies at 94 or Rye Billsbury was an American movie, stage, radio, video game, television, and voice actor who has voiced over 100 characters. He is mostly known for his role as the Apache Chief and as the Green Lantern in The All New Super Friends Hour. Rye was born on March 2, 1918 in Chicago, Illinois. Rye has been married to Patricia Rye. Rye died on September 21, 2012 from short illness in his Los Angeles, California home, aged 94 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1918 births Category:2012 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American stage actors Category:American radio actors Category:American video game actors Category:Actors from Chicago
title: Michael Rye
